dmca.title: DMCA Notification www.sbhcorp.com /Sony Mobile
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Monday, February 05, 2007 2:42 PM
To: dmcahouston
Cc: info@sbhcorp.com
Subject: DMCA Notification www.sbhcorp.com /Sony Mobile

To Whom It May Concern: 

Thank you for removing all of Sony Mobile logos and copyrighted images from the urls
provided, but in order to comply fully all of the copyrighted images and/or
trademarked logos of Sony Mobile needs to be removed from your entire website. This
case will remain open until this request is satisfied in full.  If you should need
any further assistance in reaching compliance please let me know and I will do my
best to provide you with the needed information.  I have pasted the remaining
infringing URL's.

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-1538.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-1540.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-1541.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-1644.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-1041.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-1194.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-1275.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-111.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-580.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-99.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-720.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-544.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-1205.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-543.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-742.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-736.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-737.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-738.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-739.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-740.html

http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-404.html


Thanks in advance for your attention to this matter,

Barbara Davis
LMS Manager
Net Enforcers Inc.
BDavis@netenforcers.com 
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......
Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential and are
intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be legally privileged. 
This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole purpose of delivery to the intended
recipient.  If you have received this transmission in error, any use, reproduction
or dissemination of this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the
intended recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and delete
this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.



From: <dmca@ev1servers.net>
To: <Compliance.Management@NetEnforcers.com>
Subject: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at [66.98.144.131] Case
Number: 10801
Date: 2007-02-03 01:40:03

> Your Reference Number: 
> Our Case Number: 10801
> 
> 
> , , . 
> 
> Sir, 
> 
> We feel that the user in question in this violation has successfully removed
> the material in question regarding the abuse complaint and have closed the
> case in our records, as of 2/2/2007 7:30:04 PM. 
> 
> The offending URL(S) was:  http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-1394.html 
> http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-1624.html 
> http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-1536.html 
> http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-1537.html 
> http://sbhcorp.com/scripts/homeViewItem-1272.html.   Referencing 10801
> 
> -- 
> 
> Regards,
> Legal Department
> EV1Servers.net
>

---- End forwarded message ---
